name: places/ChIJI0f-Pt1ZwokR7ZSDrqiYCx0
adrFormatAddress: 60 10th Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
I came to New York from Korea for a trip and ended up visiting the Rivian showroom, something I've always been interested in but couldn't see in Korea.

Despite being a tourist, which made actual purchasing difficult, the exceptionally friendly guidance made me want to definitely buy one if it launches in Korea.

If you're interested, make sure to visit. It will surely be a great experience!

originalText.text:
Great car company.
Everything they do is top notch.
The car is amazing. I was able to test drive it at Brooklyn's location and brought my family to see the car when we were visiting Manhattan.
Everyone loved it.

Everything they do is top notch.
The car is amazing. I was able to test drive it at Brooklyn's location and brought my family to see the car when we were visiting Manhattan.
Everyone loved it.

originalText.text:
I'm so grateful to the Rivian Team for letting me take a spin in their awesome vehicles. My wife and I had a blast driving and learning about the R1S/T.
Everyone was friendly and knowledgeable. My driving partner was Ramon, and he was the best!
He made us feel so excited about the R1T, and he taught us so much about its features and functions. From helping me drive in sports mode to being so patient with my first time driving in NYC.
Really, we felt warmth, kindness, and he was an expert on the R1 platform. He even helped us with taking photos, buying pins, and other stuff. I hope to join the Rivian R1S family someday ü§ûüèªüíñ

originalText.text:
First and foremost I would like to say this was the most engaged experience I have ever had with any sales or marketing team. They were very enthusiastic and extremely energergetic. They were able to tell me everything there was to know about the car and even take me on a test drive at short notice. I had a bucket full of suggestions for the team about the car and they took the time and effort to pen out each one.

The build quality is great, with a lot of attention to detail and a fit and finish that speaks volumes about the effort made by Rivian.

The R1T has space shuttle acceleration will leave a grin on your face that will be very difficult to remove. This will always be a memory that I will have on rewind till I get mine soon as a right-hand drive version is out.

Please pay Rivian a visit.

P.S. RJ Scaringe  I want one in Zambia. There are plenty of places I would love to take... don't worry about the charging there is plenty of sun here and I know a guy üòâ

originalText.text:
Nice place to discover the Rivian vehicule family, friendly and knowledgeable staff. They will show and explain you the features of the R1S and/or R1T and even take you for a test drive! Thank you Maurice and all the people working there for your hospitality.
Note: this is not a dealership, only a showroom. If you want to order a vehicle, you have to do it via their website.
